divs: sighting detailsmy wife and i were sitting on the front porch of our house. we do live near an airport (about 15mi. away). it's quite common to see aircraft flying over our house as they approach the runway. however, on july 3rd we saw an orange glowing ball of light that was unlike anything we've seen in the area. when i first saw it, i jokingly said "hey look there's a ufo". we both continued to watch it expecting it to be an airplane. but it wasn't. the object was likely a mile away. it moved towards our location briefly, then made a turn to the left. at this point, i told my wife that i don't think it's an airplane (it's not in the direction of the airport). then, the object faded in\out about five times then disappeared. is it an aircraft, top-secret flight test, extraterrestrial or something else? i have no idea. just reporting what i saw. i took no photos or video, wish i had.
Summary: Orange Glowing light seen in distance with movement, faded and disappeared
